entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
